onset.Description: Time from the beginning of the scan when the event starts, in seconds.

duration.Description: Duration of the event, in seconds.

Cond_1_200_2_150_HasBeenChangedTo200_150.Description: The current condition: 200 for cooperation and 150 for competition.

AnsTimePAS1_rtStage1_playerA___3Seconds.Description: Answer time of Player A in Stage 1.

AnsTimePBS1.Description: Answer time of Player B in Stage 1.

PAChoS1_1Left_2Right_.Description: Player A in Stage 1 chooses the left (1) or the right (2).

PBChoS1.Description: Player B in Stage 1 chooses the left (1) or the right (2).

MissingPAS1_0None_.Description: Missing trial for Player A in Stage 1.

MissingPBS1.Description: Missing trial for Player B in Stage 1.

AnsTimePAS2.Description: Answer time of Player A in Stage 2.

AnsTimePBS2.Description: Answer time of Player B in Stage 2.

PAChoS2.Description: Player A in Stage 2 chooses the left (1) or the right (2).

PBChoS2.Description: Player B in Stage 2 chooses the left (1) or the right (2).

MissingPAS2.Description: Missing trial for Player A in Stage 2.

MissingPBS2.Description: Missing trial for Player B in Stage 2.
